channel.title: Ice Barrage, Switching staff Capabilities
channel.description:
Okay first question How do I switch it so Ice barrage freezes the monster/person, and also to change it to multi combat spell. Second Question, Is it possible to make a Zaros mjolnir be able to auto cast a ancient spell?
I'am using deltascape source 2.
Anyone at all with any help?
